duties_responsibilities.duty: Troubleshoot, provide Tier II and Tier III support for network engineering issues.
Monitor network performance using SolarWinds and Cisco PI to identify and resolve technical challenges.
Create network documentation using Visio drawings and develop Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for repetitive tasks.
Participate in all phases of ITIL Service Lifecycle, including submitting Change Requests and investigating operational problems.
Work as part of project teams responsible for engineering and packaging releases, and investigate and resolve operational problems.
Diagnose and resolve the most challenging performance, security, and technical challenges related to network platforms.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree (in Computer Science or related field) with 5+ years’ experience in the Information Technology field. DoD 8570 IAT Level II Certification required (Security+ CE). Computing Environment certification within 6 months of start like MCSE, MCSA, MCITP, or VMware VCP.
